title: About Key Fragments...
body: Not sure if this is a bug or intentional but I never receive key fragments during my sessions. I only receive them after I've closed and reopened the client. Just to clarify, I understand you are not guaranteed a key, just wondering why you don't receive them immediately after the match anymore.

replies.body: They changed it to that following the Honor update, they explained all this on the release.

> [{quoted}](name=That Juicy Booty,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=5kWINW0E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-11T08:19:44.082+0000)
>
> They changed it to that following the Honor update, they explained all this on the release.

I know about the update, but you used to receive it immediately after the match was over. Now you receive them when you log in.

> [{quoted}](name=xX733tSnipesXx,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=5kWINW0E,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-11T09:04:15.014+0000)
>
> I know about the update, but you used to receive it immediately after the match was over. Now you receive them when you log in.

Hello there. So the answer to you question is the following:

After the update to honor they moved the keys to it. Now you don't need to win to get them. You get some even if you lose. The other thing is that they will drop togrther (no more 1 keyfrag at a time, more likely 2 or 3). The last thing is that you can get them anywhere not only in the after game screen. You can still get keys in the end game screen but you can get them on login or while shoping, too. 

I hoped that answered your questions and if so please let me know. If you have any other questions I will be happy to answer them. And remember, whatever you do, do it honorably.
